item.title: By: Quesi Job

item.description: Thanks for the tip. I recall some time back last hot caught up in these HYIP and got recked with my friends.

item.title: By: CryptpP
item.dc:creator: CryptpP
item.description: There is significant and huge difference between Ponzi and Cryptocurrency. But I'm tempted to want to say where does the profit in cryptocurrency come from? I think I kkow that. In as much as one buy a product and sell it again to another at a higher price or low depends on the value, to make more money, then cryptocurrency is legitimate.
item.content:encoded: There is significant and huge difference between Ponzi and Cryptocurrency. But I’m tempted to want to say where does the profit in cryptocurrency come from? I think I kkow that. In as much as one buy a product and sell it again to another at a higher price or low depends on the value, to make more money, then cryptocurrency is legitimate.

item.title: By: Steven
item.dc:creator: Steven
item.description: I will never invest in any Ponzi or pyramid scheme again. Don't wanna lose my money to scammers.
item.content:encoded: I will never invest in any Ponzi or pyramid scheme again. Don’t wanna lose my money to scammers.

item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: The best way I protect myself from crypto ponzi schemes is to run away from any high yielding investment.
item.content:encoded: The best way I protect myself from crypto ponzi schemes is to run away from any high yielding investment.
